mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rosecrans, William Starke to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rosecrans, William Starke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 26 1861. By Telegraph from Camp Tompkins 26 1861. Line at last open again have ordered Col Anisansel to proceed with his command to Clarksburg with his entire command and encamp there a hospital will be established in Wheeling as soon as arrangements for that purpose can be made much obliged for your kind attentions WS Rosecrans Brig Genl USA 46D143pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William Starke
Camp Tompkins
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
